entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'he' and described as looking at the Famous Witches and Wizards cards.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wizard mentioned in the context of being one of the witches and wizards on the cards that Harry is looking at.

entities.name: cliodna

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Harry's friend, mentioned as warning him about the Every-Flavour Beans.
